org.grouplens.lenskit.mf.funksvd

Class FunkSVDModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.grouplens.lenskit.mf.svd.MFModel
      • org.grouplens.lenskit.mf.funksvd.FunkSVDModel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    @DefaultProvider(value=FunkSVDModelBuilder.class)
 @Shareable
public final class FunkSVDModel
extends MFModel
    Model for FunkSVD recommendation. This extends the SVD model with clamping functions and information about the training of the features.
    See Also:
